message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth a lot to us, but I understand its value to you might be even greater. Considering its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $95 for it. I hope this offer aligns well with your expectations.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position, and I'm willing to consider your offer. However, due to the cost of production and our commitment to maintaining quality, I would need to set the product price at $90. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose setting the product price at $87.5. I hope this meets your expectations while also valuing the product appropriately.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your patience, Bob. After reviewing our costs and considering your previous offers, I believe we can reach an agreement. I propose setting the product price at $85. This allows us to maintain a fair profit while still making the product accessible to you.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your ongoing interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to compromise further. I propose setting the product price at $82.5. This allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while still being competitive in the market.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll accept the offer.
